property.name: imported
property.shortdesc: If true, the style was imported from another document. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: id
property.shortdesc: The unique ID of the CharacterStyle.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the CharacterStyle &#40;a Document, Application or CharacterStyleGroup).

property.name: index
property.shortdesc: The index of the CharacterStyle within its containing object.

property.name: styleExportTagMaps
property.shortdesc: A collection of style export tag maps.

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: basedOn
property.shortdesc: The style that this style is based on. Can return: CharacterStyle or String.

property.name: appliedFont
property.shortdesc: The font applied to the CharacterStyle, specified as either a font object or the name of font family. Can return: Font, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: fontStyle
property.shortdesc: The name of the font style. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: pointSize
property.shortdesc: The text size. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: leading
property.shortdesc: The leading applied to the text. Can return: Unit, Leading enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kerningMethod
property.shortdesc: The type of pair kerning. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: tracking
property.shortdesc: The amount by which to loosen or tighten a block of text, specified in thousands of an em. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: capitalization
property.shortdesc: The capitalization scheme. Can return: Capitalization enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: position
property.shortdesc: The text position relative to the baseline. Can return: Position enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: underline
property.shortdesc: If true, underlines the text. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strikeThru
property.shortdesc: If true, draws a strikethrough line through the text. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: ligatures
property.shortdesc: If true, replaces specific character combinations &#40;e.g., fl, fi) with ligature characters. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: noBreak
property.shortdesc: If true, keeps the text on the same line. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: horizontalScale
property.shortdesc: The horizontal scaling applied to the CharacterStyle. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: verticalScale
property.shortdesc: The vertical scaling applied to the CharacterStyle. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: baselineShift
property.shortdesc: The baseline shift applied to the text. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: skew
property.shortdesc: The skew angle of the CharacterStyle. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: fillTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the fill color of the CharacterStyle. (To specify a tint percentage, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strokeTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the stroke color of the CharacterStyle. (To specify a tint percentage, use a number in the range of 0 to 100; to use the inherited or overridden value, use -1.). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strokeWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight applied to the characters of the text. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: overprintStroke
property.shortdesc: If true, the stroke of the characters will overprint. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: overprintFill
property.shortdesc: If true, the fill color of the characters will overprint. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfFigureStyle
property.shortdesc: The figure style in OpenType fonts. Can return: OTFFigureStyle enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfOrdinal
property.shortdesc: If true, uses ordinals in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfFraction
property.shortdesc: If true, uses fractions in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfDiscretionaryLigature
property.shortdesc: If true, uses discretionary ligatures in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfTitling
property.shortdesc: If true, uses titling forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfContextualAlternate
property.shortdesc: If true, uses contextual alternate forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfSwash
property.shortdesc: If true, uses swash forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: underlineColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the underline stroke. . Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: underlineGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the underline stroke. Note: Valid when underline type is not solid. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: underlineTint
property.shortdesc: The underline stroke tint &#40;as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: underlineGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the gap color of the underline stroke. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when underline type is not solid. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: underlineOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the underline stroke color will overprint. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: underlineGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the underline stroke will overprint. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: underlineType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the underline stroke. Can return: StrokeStyle, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: underlineOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount by which to offset the underline from the text baseline. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: underlineWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the underline stroke. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strikeThroughColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the strikethrough stroke. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strikeThroughGapColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the gap of the strikethrough stroke. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strikeThroughTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the strikethrough stroke. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strikeThroughGapTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the strikethrough stroke gap color. (Range: 0 to 100) Note: Valid when strike through type is not solid. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strikeThroughOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the strikethrough stroke will overprint. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strikeThroughGapOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, the gap color of the strikethrough stroke will overprint. Note: Valid when strike through type is not solid. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strikeThroughType
property.shortdesc: The stroke type of the strikethrough stroke. Can return: StrokeStyle, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strikeThroughOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount by which to offset the strikethrough stroke from the text baseline. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strikeThroughWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight of the strikethrough stroke. Can return: Unit or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: fillColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of the CharacterStyle. . Can return: Swatch or NothingEnum enumerator. Can also accept: String.

property.name: strokeColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of the CharacterStyle. Can return: Swatch or NothingEnum enumerator. Can also accept: String.

property.name: appliedLanguage
property.shortdesc: The language of the text. Can return: LanguageWithVendors, Language or NothingEnum enumerator. Can also accept: String.

property.name: otfSlashedZero
property.shortdesc: If true, use a slashed zeroes in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfHistorical
property.shortdesc: If true, use historical forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfStylisticSets
property.shortdesc: The stylistic sets to use in OpenType fonts. Can return: Long Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: gradientFillLength
property.shortdesc: The length &#40;for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the fill of the text. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: gradientFillAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the fill of the text. &#40;Range: -180 to 180). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: gradientStrokeLength
property.shortdesc: The length &#40;for a linear gradient) or radius (for a radial gradient) applied to the stroke of the text. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: gradientStrokeAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle of a linear gradient applied to the stroke of the text. &#40;Range: -180 to 180). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: gradientFillStart
property.shortdesc: The starting point &#40;in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the fill of the text, in the format [x, y]. Can return: Array of 2 Units or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: gradientStrokeStart
property.shortdesc: The starting point &#40;in page coordinates) of a gradient applied to the stroke of the text, in the format [x, y]. Can return: Array of 2 Units or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfMark
property.shortdesc: If true, uses mark positioning in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfLocale
property.shortdesc: If true, uses localized forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: positionalForm
property.shortdesc: The OpenType positional form. Can return: PositionalForms enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: name
property.shortdesc: The name of the style.

property.name: previewColor
property.shortdesc: The color to use for preview, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Can return: Array of 3 Reals &#40;0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: miterLimit
property.shortdesc: The limit of the ratio of stroke width to miter length before a miter &#40;pointed) join becomes a bevel (squared-off) join. Can return: Real (0 - 1000) or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: strokeAlignment
property.shortdesc: The stroke alignment applied to the text. Can return: TextStrokeAlign enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: endJoin
property.shortdesc: The stroke join type applied to the characters of the text. Can return: OutlineJoin enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfOverlapSwash
property.shortdesc: If true, use overlapping swash forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfStylisticAlternate
property.shortdesc: If true, use stylistic alternate forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfJustificationAlternate
property.shortdesc: If true, use alternate justification forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfStretchedAlternate
property.shortdesc: If true, use stretched alternate forms in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: characterDirection
property.shortdesc: The direction of the character. Can return: CharacterDirectionOptions enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: keyboardDirection
property.shortdesc: The keyboard direction of the character. Can return: CharacterDirectionOptions enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: digitsType
property.shortdesc: The digits type. Can return: DigitsTypeOptions enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kashidas
property.shortdesc: Use of Kashidas for justification. Can return: KashidasOptions enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: diacriticPosition
property.shortdesc: Position of diacriticical characters. Can return: DiacriticPositionOptions enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: xOffsetDiacritic
property.shortdesc: The x &#40;horizontal) offset for diacritic adjustment. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: yOffsetDiacritic
property.shortdesc: The y &#40;vertical) offset for diacritic adjustment. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: characterAlignment
property.shortdesc: The alignment of small characters to the largest character in the line. Can return: CharacterAlignment enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: tsume
property.shortdesc: The amount of horizontal character compression. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: leadingAki
property.shortdesc: The amount of space before each character. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: trailingAki
property.shortdesc: The amount of space after each character. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: characterRotation
property.shortdesc: The rotation angle &#40;in degrees) of individual characters. Note: The rotation is counterclockwise. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: jidori
property.shortdesc: The number of grid squares in which to arrange the text. . Can return: Short Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: shataiMagnification
property.shortdesc: The amount &#40;as a percentage) of shatai obliquing to apply. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: shataiDegreeAngle
property.shortdesc: The shatai lens angle &#40;in degrees). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: shataiAdjustRotation
property.shortdesc: If true, applies shatai rotation. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: shataiAdjustTsume
property.shortdesc: If true, adjusts shatai tsume. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: tatechuyoko
property.shortdesc: If true, makes the character horizontal in vertical text. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: tatechuyokoXOffset
property.shortdesc: The horizontal offset for horizontal characters in vertical text. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: tatechuyokoYOffset
property.shortdesc: The vertical offset for horizontal characters in vertical text. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenFillColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of kenten characters. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenStrokeColor
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of kenten characters. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenTint
property.shortdesc: The fill tint &#40;as a percentage) of kenten characters. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The stroke tint &#40;as a percentage) of kenten characters. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight &#40;in points) of kenten characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenOverprintFill
property.shortdesc: The method of overprinting the kenten fill. Can return: AdornmentOverprint enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenOverprintStroke
property.shortdesc: The method of overprinting the kenten stroke. Can return: AdornmentOverprint enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenKind
property.shortdesc: The style of kenten characters. Can return: KentenCharacter enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenPlacement
property.shortdesc: The distance between kenten characters and their parent characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenAlignment
property.shortdesc: The alignment of kenten characters relative to the parent characters. . Can return: KentenAlignment enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenPosition
property.shortdesc: The kenten position relative to the parent character. Can return: RubyKentenPosition enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenFont
property.shortdesc: The font to use for kenten characters. Can return: Font, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenFontStyle
property.shortdesc: The font style of kenten characters. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenFontSize
property.shortdesc: The size &#40;in points) of kenten characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenXScale
property.shortdesc: The horizontal size of kenten characters as a percent of the original size. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenYScale
property.shortdesc: The vertical size of kenten charachers as a percent of the original size. . Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenCustomCharacter
property.shortdesc: The character used for kenten. Note: Valid only when kenten kind is custom. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: kentenCharacterSet
property.shortdesc: The character set used for the custom kenten character. Note: Valid only when kenten kind is custom. . Can return: KentenCharacterSet enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyFill
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the fill of ruby characters. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyStroke
property.shortdesc: The swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink) applied to the stroke of ruby characters. Can return: Swatch, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyTint
property.shortdesc: The tint &#40;as a percentage) of the ruby fill color. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight &#40;in points) of ruby characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyOverprintFill
property.shortdesc: The method of overprinting the ruby fill. Can return: AdornmentOverprint enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyOverprintStroke
property.shortdesc: The method of overprinting the ruby stroke. Can return: AdornmentOverprint enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyStrokeTint
property.shortdesc: The stroke tint &#40;as a percentage) of ruby characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyFont
property.shortdesc: The font applied to ruby characters. Can return: Font, String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyFontStyle
property.shortdesc: The font style of ruby characters. Can return: String or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyFontSize
property.shortdesc: The size &#40;in points) of ruby characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyOpenTypePro
property.shortdesc: If true, uses OpenType Pro fonts for ruby. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyXScale
property.shortdesc: The horizontal size of ruby characters, specified as a percent of the original size. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyYScale
property.shortdesc: The vertical size of ruby characters, specified as a percent of the original size. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyType
property.shortdesc: The ruby type. Can return: RubyTypes enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyAlignment
property.shortdesc: The ruby alignment. Can return: RubyAlignments enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyPosition
property.shortdesc: The position of ruby characters relative to the parent text. Can return: RubyKentenPosition enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyXOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount of horizontal space between ruby and parent characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyYOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount of vertical space between ruby and parent characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyParentSpacing
property.shortdesc: The ruby spacing relative to the parent text. . Can return: RubyParentSpacing enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyAutoAlign
property.shortdesc: If true, auto aligns ruby. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyOverhang
property.shortdesc: If true, constrains ruby overhang to the specified amount. For information on specifying an amount, see ruby parent overhang amount. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyAutoScaling
property.shortdesc: If true, automatically scales ruby to the specified percent of parent text size. For information on specifying a percent, see ruby parent scaling percent. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyParentScalingPercent
property.shortdesc: The amount &#40;as a percentage) to scale the parent text size to determine the ruby text size. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyParentOverhangAmount
property.shortdesc: The amount by which ruby characters can overhang the parent text. Can return: RubyOverhang enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: warichu
property.shortdesc: If true, turns on warichu. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: warichuSize
property.shortdesc: The amount &#40;as a percentage) to scale parent text size to determine warichu size. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: warichuLines
property.shortdesc: The number of lines of warichu within a single normal line. Can return: Short Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: warichuLineSpacing
property.shortdesc: The gap between lines of warichu characters. Can return: Real or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: warichuAlignment
property.shortdesc: The warichu alignment. Can return: WarichuAlignment enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: warichuCharsAfterBreak
property.shortdesc: The minimum number of characters allowed after a line break. . Can return: Short Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: warichuCharsBeforeBreak
property.shortdesc: The minimum number of characters allowed before a line break. Can return: Short Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfProportionalMetrics
property.shortdesc: If true, kerns according to proportional CJK metrics in OpenType fonts. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfHVKana
property.shortdesc: If true, switches hiragana fonts, which have different glyphs for horizontal and vertical. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: otfRomanItalics
property.shortdesc: If true, applies italics to half-width alphanumerics. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: scaleAffectsLineHeight
property.shortdesc: If true, the line changes size when characters are scaled. . Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: cjkGridTracking
property.shortdesc: If true, uses grid tracking to track non-Roman characters in CJK grids. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: glyphForm
property.shortdesc: The glyph variant to substitute for standard glyphs. Can return: AlternateGlyphForms enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyAutoTcyDigits
property.shortdesc: The number of digits included in auto tcy &#40;tate-chuu-yoko) in ruby. Can return: Short Integer or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyAutoTcyIncludeRoman
property.shortdesc: If true, includes Roman characters in auto tcy &#40;tate-chuu-yoko) in ruby. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: rubyAutoTcyAutoScale
property.shortdesc: If true, automatically scales glyphs in auto tcy &#40;tate-chuu-yoko) in ruby to fit one em. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.

property.name: label
property.shortdesc: A property that can be set to any string.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

parameter.name: replacingWith
parameter.shortdesc: The style to apply in place of the deleted style. &#40;Optional)

method.name: move
method.shortdesc: Moves the style to the specified location.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The location relative to the reference object or within the containing object.

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the to parameter specifies before or after. Can accept: ParagraphStyle, ParagraphStyleGroup, CharacterStyle, CharacterStyleGroup, CellStyle, CellStyleGroup, TableStyle, TableStyleGroup, Document or Application. &#40;Optional)

method.name: insertLabel
method.shortdesc: Sets the label to the value associated with the specified key.

method.name: extractLabel
method.shortdesc: Gets the label value associated with the specified key.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the CharacterStyle.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
